rows: Name
Description
Benefits and use cases
Emails in Outlook
Meetings in Outlook and Teams
Identify contacts
Detect existing contacts based on email participants and show recent history. Suggest creating new contacts if none are found.
Streamlines contact acquisition and profile enrichment. Reduces manual input and improves CRM data quality.
Summarize email
Generate a summary of the full email thread.
Saves time and accelerates decision-making by providing quick insight into long email threads.
Reply to email
Draft a context-aware email response using the thread and Creatio data.
Improves response time and consistency. Boosts customer loyalty and agent performance.
Check open cases
Search for open cases related to the current email and highlight if any are overdue.
Helps reduce missed follow-ups and improve resolution time and CSAT.
New meeting
Find a slot for the meeting with the needed people.
Automates meeting scheduling, improves coordination, and saves time.
Prepare for the sales meeting
Generate personalized recommendations to prepare for a client meeting at the Opportunity stage.
Enables sales executives to prepare quickly and efficiently.

Identify contacts

Detect existing contacts based on email participants and show recent history. Suggest creating new contacts if none are found.

Streamlines contact acquisition and profile enrichment. Reduces manual input and improves CRM data quality.
